translation: Fly to Him for refuge with all your being, O Arjuna; by His grace you will obtain supreme peace and the eternal abode.
commentary: 18.62 tam to Him? Eve even? take refuge take refuge? with all thy being? India Or Bharata? by His grace? The supreme supreme? peace peace? Place the abode? You shall obtain (thou) shalt obtain? shasvatam eternal.Commentary Do total and perfect surrender to the Lord. Do not keep any secret desires for silent gratification.
